author: USA TODAY, Kelly Tyko, USA TODAY
title: Walmart, Sam's Club to require employees to wear face masks starting Monday as part of coronavirus response
description: Walmart and Sam's Club will require employees wear masks starting Monday to prevent the spread of COVID-19 and will encourage shoppers to wear masks.
content:
If you can't purchase a mask, here's how to make one from a t-shirt.
USA TODAY
Walmart and Sam's Club will require employees to wear masks or other face coverings starting Monday to prevent the spread of the coronavirus.
Shoppers also will be encouraged to… [+2329 chars]
